added-queue: &2Added to shop creation queue. Touch where you want to create.
added-rm-queue: &2Added shop removal queue. Touch where you want to remove.
shop-create-failed: &4Failed to create shop due to unknown reason.
no-permission-buy: &4You don't have permission to buy item.
no-money: You do not have &4{M}{0}&r to buy &4{1}&r.
full-inventory: &4You do not have inventory slot to buy item.
failed-buy: &4Failed to buy item due to unknown reason.
bought-item: You have bought item {1} of &b{0}&r for &6{M}{2}&r.
